quoteText:
CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

This Privacy Policy is subject to occasional revision, and if we make any material changes in the way we use your Personal Data, we will notify you by sending you an email to the last email address associated with your Account, and/or by prominently posting notice of the changes on our Site.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
